table.summary: All authors and the number of their changes and lines of code in this directory

dd.p: release the Builder as soon as possible in order to reduce the MAX memory required.
2 lines of code changed in 1 file:
Quick fix for escape of URL.
2 lines of code changed in 1 file:
Use JFreeChart 1.0.13
4 lines of code changed in 2 files:
Adding facilities to add a plot or background image in the charts.
19 lines of code changed in 3 files:
Added documentation for the new Cloud mechanism.
11 lines of code changed in 3 files:
Upgrade JFreeChart and web site.
8 lines of code changed in 1 file:
Add ability to MERGE 2 users through the config-file user.[userName].replacedBy=[newUserName]
1 lines of code changed in 1 file:

- Update manual
- Added possibility to add copyright text on charts
4 lines of code changed in 1 file:
Improve sizes.
50 lines of code changed in 3 files:

Make the Charts much more configurable through the properties file.
Upgraded to JFreeChart 1.0.12.
88 lines of code changed in 2 files:

A bit of fun, added links to Twitter. In the statcvs.properties file defining the user, you can add:
user.[cvsusername].twitterUsername=[twitterUserName]
user.[cvsusername].twitterUserId=[twitterUserId] -> which is an int, not easy to find...
user.[cvsusername].twitterIncludeHtml=[true/false]
user.[cvsusername].twitterIncludeFlash=[true/false]
12 lines of code changed in 2 files:
Fixing bug in new rolling report.
3 lines of code changed in 1 file:

Moved version to 0.5.0
Done a cleanUp too.
6 lines of code changed in 2 files:
Added -chartset option on command line and ant task for html/xdoc documentation.
5 lines of code changed in 5 files:
prepare headline.
1 lines of code changed in 1 file:
Change version to 0.4.0
1 lines of code changed in 1 file:
Change version to 0.4.0
254 lines of code changed in 2 files:

Applied patch for [ 1799499 ] LOCChartMaker NullPointerException
Thanks to Shamil Bikineyev
12 lines of code changed in 4 files:
Add Maven Build.
351 lines of code changed in 6 files:

ul.li: statcvs.old: .cvsignore (+4), maven.xml (+33 -36), project.properties (+19), project.xml (+222 -138), run-statcvs.properties (new 60), statcvs.bat (new 13)

dd.p: The RepoMap and LOCChurn pages are now available to StatCVS.
207 lines of code changed in 1 file:
[1927587]Added jdom and some tests under run.xml
23 lines of code changed in 1 file:
[1927587]Providing a basic XML export for the StatCVS statistics.
1 lines of code changed in 1 file:
Added details for cyganiak
4 lines of code changed in 1 file:
[Request 1252864 ] Add a placeholder statcvs.properties to run the 'real name' feature against StatCVS, developers please amend your data. Cheers.
50 lines of code changed in 2 files:
Version number to 0.3.1-dev
1 lines of code changed in 1 file:
Version number to v0.3
1 lines of code changed in 1 file:
Version number to 0.3-dev; we have enough new stuff to warrant a 0.1 bump
1 lines of code changed in 1 file:
Added -no-developer option to exclude noisy accounts
2 lines of code changed in 1 file:

- Ant task supports all options again
- Ant task uses the same names as the command line for everything
- build file can call Ant task via "ant run.ant"
13 lines of code changed in 1 file:
Oops, broke the build when updating to latest JFreeChart. Fixed.
2 lines of code changed in 1 file:
Upgrade to latest JFreeChart
2 lines of code changed in 1 file:
Version number to 0.2.5-dev
1 lines of code changed in 1 file:
sample report tweak
1 lines of code changed in 1 file:
Set version to 0.2.4a (skip 0.2.4 because StatSVN 0.2.0 contains a CVS-built and somewhat buggy version of statcvs.jar with that name)
1 lines of code changed in 1 file:
Version number to 0.2.3 :-)
1 lines of code changed in 1 file:
Renamed "dist" task to "jar"
2 lines of code changed in 1 file:
Changed viewcvs URL in 'run' target to new SourceForge server
1 lines of code changed in 1 file:
tweak
1 lines of code changed in 1 file:

- Buildfile builds classes for Java 1.4
- Fixed some Javadoc warnings
3 lines of code changed in 1 file:
Put Eclipse settings into CVS
28 lines of code changed in 3 files:
